data.title: Oregon Department of Transportation : DMV Manuals & Publications : Oregon Driver & Motor Vehicle Services : State of Oregon
data.text:
The Oregon Driver Manual​ is now accessible to web translation tools. It has information about road signs, traffic laws and other information you need to know to drive in Oregon, and to pass the standard Knowledge Test (for Class C non-commercial). Use the translate function (upper right-hand corner) to translate the manual to whichever language you prefer.​

While you may take the Oregon Knowledge Test as many times as you need, it is highly recommended that you study and review the Oregon Driver Manual to ensure you pass the Knowledge Test the first time! For more information on our Pass/Fail rates, please visit our Statistics page​.

Note: The manual is also available in audio format in English and Spanish, and in PDF form, also in English ​or Spanish​. In order to view important illustrations and diagrams, we recommend you use the online manual along with the audio version.

​

The Oregon Motorcycle & Moped Manual is now accessible to web translation tools. The information covers motorcycle and moped road rules and safe riding practices. It has the information you need to pass the Motorcycle Knowledge Test, if required. Use the translate function (upper right-hand corner) to translate the manual to whichever language you prefer.​​

Note: The manual is also available in PDF format or audio format. In order to view important illustrations and diagrams, we recommend you use the online manual along with the audio version.​
